attributes.action: Get the UK Government to step in & try help bring Safi Qurashi back home
attributes.additional_details:
Our brother, father, cousin and great friend Safi Qurashi was jailed in the UAE wrongly, because whilst acting as an intermediary, it is claimed that his business cheque bounced.
This is not the case - there are many evidences available proving his innocence & wrongful conviction.
We want the UK government to try and step in and protect him as he is a british born citizen who has done nothing wrong and is greatly missed by his young daughters and the rest of his family.
More Information can be found at http://justiceformydad.com/
